name: Discarded
description:
This game was created in 2016 and is based on the theme of the Berimbau. The Berimbau is an African/Brazilian instrument. The assignment was to create a main menu and pause menu for a game, so I decided to set it in an African landscape. I created a map with water surroundings and huts for village people. Due to time restrictions I was unable to add many sounds, but the UI was the focus.

Thanks for playing.
